actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1133.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6667) to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to authorization extensions and industrial cost recovery.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6667 (Water pollution control).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6667) to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to authorization extensions and industrial cost recovery.
